thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Philippa - Sydney
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Philippa - Sydney

author: Philippa - Sydney
title: Philippa - Sydney
text:
I used Pack & Send to pick up something from Melbourne I had bought on ebay.
It was very helpful and efficient and even when I had to ring up and change the delivery booking time there was no problem.
The Pack & Send people I spoke to were helpful and the website is easy to use.
The cost is also very reasonable.
I recommend this service and congratulate you on your helpfulness and efficiency.
